name: Team Pineapple-Cri GDevelop game jam submission
name_original: Team Pineapple-Cri GDevelop game jam submission
description: The programmer was too lazy to finish this game... Luckily, since he made the game with GDevelop, the power of events is accessible to you, the player! Find creative ways to finish the game as fast as possible using the events the programmer left you, and may the force be with you! ...wait I meant good luck, and try to get the highest score 😎!
